title: Ornate undead combat dummy

properties.name: description
properties.value: The ornate undead combat dummy can be built in the combat dummy space of the combat room in a player-owned house. It requires 58 Construction to upgrade the undead combat dummy and when built, it gives 300 experience. The player must have a hammer and a saw in their inventory to build it.

The ornate undead combat dummy can be built in the combat dummy space of the combat room in a player-owned house. It requires 58 Construction to upgrade the undead combat dummy and when built, it gives 300 experience. The player must have a hammer and a saw in their inventory to build it.

Contents

  • 1 Creation
    • 1.1 Upgrade
    • 1.2 Total
  • 2 Variants
  • 3 Changes

Creation[edit | edit source]

Variants[edit | edit source]

The ornate undead combat dummy can be right-clicked to swap to another variant of the dummy, which requires additional items (unnoted if applicable) in order to be able to pick a certain variant. Once the items required are consumed, players are free to swap to that dummy without additional cost.

Note: Because other dummy variants besides the undead combat dummy do not act as a Slayer monster, the Slayer helmet damage bonus will not apply to any of them.

Dummy variant Required item(s) Cost Function Examine
Ornate undead combat dummy No additional items 1,148,692 Acts as an undead, a demon, and a Slayer monster. This dummy is very susceptible to any sort of combat, and functions as any slayer task.
Ornate wilderness combat dummy 500 Revenant ether 76,000 Acts as a monster in the Wilderness. This dummy is very susceptible to any sort of combat, and functions as a wilderness monster.
Ornate kalphite combat dummy 10 ensouled kalphite heads 12,320 Acts as a kalphite. This dummy is very susceptible to any sort of combat, and functions as a kalphite.
Ornate kurask combat dummy 1 kurask head or stuffed kurask head N/A Acts as a monster that can only be damaged by leaf-bladed weapons. This dummy is very susceptible to any sort of combat, and functions as a kurask.
Ornate vampyre combat dummy 20 vampyre dust 12,600 Acts as a vampyre. This dummy is very susceptible to any sort of combat, and functions as a vampyre.
Ornate dragon combat dummy 1 Vorkath's head or Vorkath's stuffed head N/A Acts as a draconic monster. This dummy is very susceptible to any sort of combat, and functions as a dragon.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 December 2021
(update)

The amulet of avarice buff will now apply to the Ornate wilderness combat dummy.

The '''ornate undead combat dummy''' can be built in the [[combat dummy space]] of the [[combat room]] in a [[player-owned house]]. It requires 58 [[Construction]] to upgrade the [[undead combat dummy]] and when built, it gives 300 [[experience]]. The player must have a [[hammer]] and a [[saw]] in their inventory to build it.

==Variants==
The ornate undead combat dummy can be right-clicked to swap to another variant of the dummy, which requires additional items (unnoted if applicable) in order to be able to pick a certain variant. Once the items required are consumed, players are free to swap to that dummy without additional cost.

Note: Because other dummy variants besides the undead combat dummy do not act as a [[Slayer monster]],  the [[Slayer helmet]] damage bonus will not apply to any of them.
